summary: SPRING HANGERS BROKE (MANUFACTURED BY LIPPERT).  PREVIOUS RECALL # 14E052000.  BOTH REAR-MOST HANGERS BROKE WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 7 DAYS APART.  EACH COULD HAVE CAUSED INJURY AND/OR DEATH AS WE WERE DRIVING ON FREEWAYS AT 60 MPH.  CONTACTED MANUFACTURER BUT NO ACTION AS YET.  I HAVE THE BROKEN HANGERS.
